Title: Requires at least two photo speed violation monitoring systems in highway construction or maintenance work areas located on a controlled-access highway or on the thruway
Summary: Requires at least two photo speed violation monitoring systems in highway construction or maintenance work areas located on a controlled-access highway or on the thruway.
LawCode: Amd ยง1180-e, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring at least two photo speed violation monitoring systems in highway construction or maintenance work areas located on a controlled-access highway or on the thruway
